title: Love this hotel
text: As reported by other reviewers, this is a really lovely hotel. Fantastic - actually outstanding - service from the moment of arrival to the second we sadly left. Nothing was too much trouble and we were made to feel extremely special. I believe this is how they treat all their guests. A beautiful platter of goodies together with champagne was provided on the evening of my husband's birthday. The decor - stunning - warmly contemporary and uniquely Kit Kemp. Our suite was bright and very spacious for London (401). It was located directly opposite the lift and, at first, I was a bit worried it would be noisy. Not so. Totally silent - we never heard a soul. It overlooked the roof terrace of a building next door and we watched a fashion shoot there one afternoon - what a treat! The room was spotless - probably the cleanest hotel room I have ever stayed in. Attention to detail is something that the staff excel at. I was even provided with a heat protection mat for my hair straighteners without having to ask. Bathroom amenities were of very high quality with a lovely lavender and eucalyptus fragrance (suitable for men and women) and replenished generously. Breakfast - plentiful with many special and interesting items. Muesli choices were especially delicious. Cocktail bar is buzzing every night - again, great service and great cocktails. The location is spot on - we walked everywhere and there are multiple tube stations nearby. I could go on and on but suffice it to say, this was a wonderful experience and I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
